label: Bioactivity Filter
description: Filter compound bioactivity (IC50) against TAS2R14, TRPV1, and TRPA1 receptors.

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Input table of compounds (IDs and SMILES) to score.

defaultInputs.name: Target List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Targets or assays (EC50 / IC50) that bioactivity should be predicted against.

defaultOutputs.name: Rank
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Rank of the compound based on bioactivity score.

defaultOutputs.name: DTIGN–LigoSpace Bioactivity Score
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Combined bioactivity score from DTIGN and LigoSpace models.

defaultOutputs.name: Predicted % Inhibition (0.05 µM)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted percentage inhibition at 0.05 µM (CHEMBL5703826 - Inhibition of CDK20 Lys2 labeling in human A-375 cells at 0.05 µM, measured by KiNativ profiling).

defaultOutputs.name: Confidence
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Confidence level of the prediction (High, Medium, Low).

configSchema.tooltip: Input the compound-target docking for bioactivity prediction

configSchema.label: Available Tools
